name: 이름
To take an Expert or Master skill you mu: 숙련 기능이나 통달 기능을 선택하기 위해서는 먼저 선행 기능 중 하나를 선택해야 합니다
Growing plants in nutrient solutions wit: 토양 없이 배양액에서 식물을 키움 (우주에서 농사)
The solid features of any terrestrial pl: 지구형 행성 혹은 자연적 위성의 고체적 특성
진공 상태나 진공 슈트 안에서 행동함
Operation and use of large pieces of equ: 거대한 장비의 운전과 조종 (크레인, 특수잠수복, 지계차 등)
The expression or application of a speci: 한 종족의 창조적인 능력과 상상의 표현 혹은 응용
Standard basic training given to all mil: 군대 관련인이 기본적으로 받는 표준적인 훈련.
Outer rim colonies and seedy parts of th: 아우터 림의 식민지와 은하계의 지저분한 부분
The identification of the substances of: 어떤 물질로 구성되었는지에 대한 실체의 증명
geology, zero-g, heavy machinery, scaven: 지질학, ZERO-G, 중장비 조종, 쓰레기 뒤지기
Training in the tools and procedures use: 소행성 채굴에 쓰이는 도구를 익히고 절차를 훈련함
heavy machinery, computers, mechanical r: 중장비 조종, 컴퓨터 사용, 기계 수리
Design, building, and use of engines, ma: 설계, 건축, 그리고 엔진, 기계 사용, 구조
Unauthorized access to computer systems: 컴퓨터 시스템에의 승인 받지 못한 접근
Study of nature and properties of matter: 자연과 물질과 에너지의 성질에 대한 연구
Alien biology: 외계 생물의 생명 작용에 대한 연구
Medical speciality involving manual oper: 수동 조작을 포함한 전문적 의료 행위
Design and operation of robots, drones,: 로봇, 드론, 그리고 안드로이드의 설계와 조종
Obscure alien mysticism, religion, and b: 이해하기 힘든 외계의 신비주의, 종교, 그리고 믿음
Once per session, a Teamster may re-roll: 한 세션에 한 번 패닉 이펙트 테이블에서 주사위를 다시 굴릴 수 있습니다.
Fear Saves made in the presence of Andro: 안드로이드가 있을 때 공포 저항 판정은 불이익을 받습니다.
Whenever a Scientist fails a Sanity Save: 과학자가 이성 저항에 실패하면 주변에 있는 플레이어들이 1 스트레스를 받습니다.
Whenever a Marine Panics, every friendly: 해병이 공황 상태에 빠지면, 주변에 있는 동료들은 공포 극복 판정을 해야 합니다.
Sanity is your ability to explain away l: 이성은 우주의 논리적인 모순을 잘 해명하고, 혼돈을 합리화하고, 환상과 속임수를 찾아내고 긴장 속에서도 빠르게 생각을 할 수 있는 능력입니다.
Fear is how well you can cope with emoti: 공포는 얼마나 잘 감정적인 트라우마에 대처하고, 두려움뿐만 아니라 고독, 우울 혹은 그 밖에 다른 감정의 파도를 숨길 수 있는가를 나타냅니다.
Body is your reflexes, and how well you: 육체는 반사신경과 얼마나 잘 굶주림, 질병, 그리고 신체 내부로 침입하려 시도하는 다른 유기체들에게 저항하는가를 나타냅니다.
Armor is how resistant you ae to damage: 장갑은 전투 중에 총알, 손갈퀴, 이빨 등에 지속적인 피해를 입는 것에 얼마나 저항할 수 있는지를 나타냅니다.
You are one of the luminaries of this fi: 이 분야의 권위자이며 최첨단 기술이나 고도로 특화되고 세세한 정보까지 알고 있습니다.
You have the equivalent of a doctorate o: 박사 학위에 준하는 교육을 받았거나 매우 오랫동안의 경험이 있습니다.
You’ve received standard training in thi: 이 분야에 대한 학사 학위에 준하는 표준적인 교육을 받았거나 다년간의 실무 경험을 가지고 있습니다.
How able-bodied you are. Lifting, pushin: 몸이 튼튼한 정도입니다. 오르기, 밀기, 세게 때리기 등이 있습니다.
How quickly you can act and react under: 압박 속에서 빠르게 행동하고 반응할 수 있는 정도입니다.
The value the ship must roll under to av: The value the ship must roll under to avoid taking Damage. Generally the captain or acting captain of the ship rolls the Armor Save.
Used during Combat Checks. You can use w: Used during Combat Checks. You can use whichever is higher: your own Combat Stat or the ship's.
Used as both a stat and a Sanity Save, s: Used as both a stat and a Sanity Save, should the need arise.
Often used to see if the ship can dodge: Often used to see if the ship can dodge asteroids or escape explosions from collapsing stars.
charmancer-step1:
마더쉽 RPG 캐릭터 생성에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 이 생성기는 플레이어 캐릭터 제작을 제공합니다. 마더쉽은 SF 공포 RPG로, 여러분과 여러분의 동료 선원들은 우주에서 가장 생존하기 어려운 환경인 외우주에서 살아남기 위해 노력하게 됩니다! 여러분은 버려진 우주선을 발견하
거나 이상한 미지의 세계를 탐험하고 적대적인 외계 생명들을 몰살하고 매 순간을 잠식하는 공포를 조사할 것입니다. 이제 시작합시다!
charmancer-step2: 마더쉽은 모든 판정에 10 주사위를 굴리므로 특성치를 정할 때는 6d10을 굴립니다. 특성치 30이면 평균값입니다. 하지만 지금 숫자에 너무 집착하는 것은 좋지 않습니다. 아래에 있는 버튼을 눌러 특성치를 만드세요!
charmancer-step3a: 마더쉽에는 선원, 과학자, 안드로이드, 그리고 해병이라는 네 가지 기본 클래스가 있습니다. 그 중 하나를 선택하거나, '커스텀'을 선택하여 여러분만의 캐릭터를 만드세요.
charmancer-step3b: Each class has their own starting Save values which represent how resistant they are to different kinds of trauma. The starting Saves for your selected class have been filled in below. Each of the classes also alters your starting Stats a little bit, which you'll see reflected above. Each class also deals with Stress and Panic differently; your Class' special rule is indicated below.
charmancer-step4: Each class comes preloaded with some relevant Skills which will help them perform better at different challenges. Additionally, each class has a number of points to spend on Skills during character creation. Spend all your skill points now, keeping in mind that Trained Skills cost 1 point, Expert Skills cost 2 points, Master Skills cost 3 points, and that to take Expert or Master skills you must have already taken one of its prequsite skills. Alternatively, if you don't want to spend them right now, we'll save them for you for later!
charmancer-step5: There are four different starting equipment packages to choose from. These are here for convenience, so you don't have to spend a lot of time shopping before the game begins. You also get to roll for a random Trinket and Patch; they don't have any mechanical significance, but might give you insight into what your character is like. You also get to roll for your starting credits (5d10x10). If you select a package with Armor, it will improve your Armor Save. Don't worry, we'll take care of that at the end for you!
charmancer-step6: Take a few moments to review your character. If you're not happy with anything, you can navigate backwards and change it. Once you're ready, click the green checkmark at the bottom of the screen. You're now ready to play your first session of Mothership!
choose this option to enter your own inf: choose this option to enter your own information
Ensure you have selected a class: Ensure you have selected a class
You can add custom equipment to the char: 여러분은 캐릭터 생성을 완료한 후에 커스텀 장비를 추가할 수 있습니다.
Life support keeps the human crew alive. Each point of life support can support up to 10 humans. For every point below the required minimum, anyone not wearing a vaccsuit must make a Body Save every hour or take 1d10 damage. This includes those in cryochambers as well, but does not include androids. Many ships include 2-3 times the required amount of life support in case of extra passengers or damage to the system.
The command module is the cockpit, comma: The command module is the cockpit, command center, or bridge of a ship. For every 4 officer positions, one command module is required. Officers can be captains, first mates, navigation officers, communications officers, and is largely up to the Warden and the players to decide.
Armor plating protects the ship fromsmal: Armor plating protects the ship fromsmall metoerites, space dust and debris, as well as, if need be, attacks from other vessels. Every point of armor costs 3 hull, and grants the ship +10% Armor Save (Max 80).
Jump drives enable the ship to travel th: Jump drives enable the ship to travel through hyperspace. Every point of Jump Drive increasesthe ship’s jump capability by 1 (Max 9). The first drive costs 1 hull, the second costs 2, the third costs 3, etc.
The ship’s computer is a powerful artifi: The ship’s computer is a powerful artificial intelligence that helps with astrogation, combat, and anumber of other autonomous tasks. A ship’s Intellect is equal to the number of computer modules x10 +30%. It’s Combat is equal to the number of computer modules x10 +10%. A computer module is required for each jumpdrive. Additionally, each computer module equipped allows the computer to take more actions during combat.
Galleys contain a kitchen, restrooms, an: Galleys contain a kitchen, restrooms, and a common area on a ship. Any ships making trips longer than 1 day must have 1 galley for every 2 life support modules or else the crew must take Body Saves once/day. Failure means 2d10 damage and 1d10 Stress. Galleys must be re-stocked once a month and extra stores take up 1 Cargo.
For every weapon your ship has you must: For every weapon your ship has you must have 1 mount for it. You can find the list of ship weapons in The Player's Survival Guide
Medical bays allow scientists, doctors,: Medical bays allow scientists, doctors, and other researchers to heal crew members and perform various procedures (biopsies, autopsies, surgery). Each connected medbay on the ship grants +5% to the Intellect of the Scientists or Androids using them. Medical bays also grant advantage on Body Saves made for healing.
Cryochambers allow humans to sleep durin: Cryochambers allow humans to sleep during long trips, particularly through hyperspace.  Androids do not require them. Each point of hull spent on cryochambers accomodates up to 4 cryosleep pods.  Individuals who don’t go into cryosleep during hyperspace jumps often have strange and terrifying experiences.
Generally, if a ship is to travel throug: Generally, if a ship is to travel through normal space for at least a week, then living quarters or “staterooms” are provided for each of the ship’s officers, or other important crew members.
The same as living quarters, except they: The same as living quarters, except they are non-private and house up to twelve crew members.  Like living quarters, they are not-essential rooms, but ships that need them, but don’t have them, give their crew +1 Stress per journey or month of travel.
Cargo holds are essentially 20x20m rooms: Cargo holds are essentially 20x20m rooms used for storage. Each cargo hold can hold up to 10 cargo units (each cargo is roughly the size of a large pallet). Cargo holds can also be used for any other basic room not provided for on this list (brigs, secret compartments, mining equipment, training facilities, hangars, armories, etc.).
Similar to the medical bay, the science: Similar to the medical bay, the science lab allows for detailed research. Each connected sciencelab grants +5% Intellect to Scientists and Androids using them to conduct research or experiments. Additionally, they can be designated as repair shops and used by Teamsters to repair electronics, machines, or even Androids.
Without thrusters, the ship cannot move. Every thruster module equipped increases the speed ofthe ship by +10% (to a maximum of 80). Additionally, thrusters cost an extra 1 hull for every 10 base hull.
Without the engine, the entire ship ceas: Without the engine, the entire ship ceases to operate and becomes a ruin. You must have 1 engine module for every jump drive, plus 1 for every 4 thrusters, plus 1 for every 20 points of base hull.
The engine needs fuel to run on. Every j: The engine needs fuel to run on. Every jump requires double the fuel of the jump (Jump 2 = 4 fuel) and thrusters burn 1 unit of fuel per day. The engine requires at least 3 fuel for every point of engine plus any extra fuel capacity you want to add. More fuel can be stored in Cargo Holds at 1 Fuel per 10 Cargo.
Frame covers the miscellaneous parts of: Frame covers the miscellaneous parts of a ship, docking gear, airlocks, ventillation, corridors, comms relays, everything else a ship generally uses. Frame is 1 point per 10 points of base hull.
This works exactly like the PC's combat: This works exactly like the PC's combat stat, except it doubles as an armor save.
This works exactly like the PC's speed s: This works exactly like the PC's speed stat.
This is a catchall for Fear, Sanity, Bod: This is a catchall for Fear, Sanity, Body, Intellect and everything else.
Name: 이름
